Reviews.Title: No warranty on Internet sales!
Reviews.Author: Aster
Reviews.Content: I just checked on the Speco website and found that they have a No Internet Sales policy.  From what I read, Amazon is listed clearly, that if you purchase ANY Speco products online (Unauthorized Dealers) you have NO WARRANTY PERIOD!!IMHO, I believe Amazon should have to make note of this to prospective buyers.  I'm glad I stumbled onto this BEFORE my purchase online.Here's Speco's info:  [....]Aster

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264
Gigabit Ethernet
VGA
USB
Composite Video
ProductInfo.Name: Speco D4RS H.264 Four Channel Digital Video Recorder with 500 GB Hard Drive (D4RS500)
